attributes.action: Create a 'Life Licence' on the same basis as a driving licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Get 12 points on your driving licence and you're banned.  I propose a LIFE LICENCE where civil and criminal offences accrue.  Steal a Mars Bar and get 1 point; kill someone and get 90 points ... you get the idea?  Tot up to 100 points, and you're removed from the country, all your assets are forfeit and your citizenship is revoked.  Offences to stay on the Life Licence for 10 years.
